title: 2 bedroom Leafy area near park in Chelsea All utilities incl.
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Either as a share; 900 for the double room 

OR

Entire flat for 1,400

5 - 10 min. walk to all transport. 

Secure area and building

Washing machine, bath and communal garden, parking space if staying long term.

Non smoker. To share with one other health oriented and creative person.

Proof of how paying rent or guarantee needed.
